attributes.action: Radically review the rôle of the Foreign Office in the light of repeated failures towards British citizens abroad.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's no secret that the F&CO is more focused to British commercial and status interests than it is to its citizens.  Its 9 online objectives even fail to mention something like "Support Britons in time of personal crises whilst abroad"!
Other EU FOs take care of their nationals whilst the F&CO fails dismally - and unashamedly.
It's a club for diplomats and business people firstly, and a cosmetic safety-line for troubled Britons last.
It's a disgraceful situation that needs to be addressed if any sense of Britain Co Ltd citizenship retains any worth.
